title: Presidential Nomination Sent to the Senate, 5/10/2010 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 10, 2010

 



Presidential Nomination Sent to the Senate, 5/10/2010




NOMINATION SENT TO THE SENATE:
Elena Kagan, of Massachusetts, to be an Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States, vice John Paul Stevens, retiring.
